titleStmt.title: The Earl of Danby's answer to Sr. Robert Howards book, entituled An account of the state of His Majesties revenue as it was left by the Earl of Danby at Lady-day, 1679.
titleStmt.author: Leeds, Thomas Osborne, Duke of, 1631-1712.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
